title: Interpretation of a vision of wearing a wedding dress for an unmarried girl without a groom

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a single girl without a groom: A dream about wearing a white wedding dress for a single woman is considered a dream that brings good news to the dreamer as long as the vision does not contain anything bad or bad. The details of each dream have its own interpretation based on the details mentioned by the fortuneteller during the vision, and it conveys the vision of wearing a dress in a dream without a groom, to the imminent marriage of this girl in the near future, and it may also bring this girl to make a grave mistake in her life, and this dream comes to warn her against staying away from... This is a mistake and a return to the right path. Interpretation of the vision of wearing a wedding dress without a groom for an unmarried woman. The translator cited the scholar Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of the vision of wearing a wedding dress without a groom for a single woman, indicating that this single woman will get married very soon and that the marriage between them will be a happy marriage. While living a beautiful and happy life, God willing, Ibn Sirin also mentions that seeing a white dress in a dream basically indicates goodness and is one of the happy news that the vision brings. Without a groom, it may indicate that she has made a grave mistake in her life and that she is happy if she was wrong, but this happiness will not last long and the mistake may occur in an emotional relationship. What is the interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream for a single woman carries a group of Interpretations and interpretations that can come to interpret this vision, as all interpreters rely heavily on the details contained in the vision to reach the correct interpretation. The interpretations of seeing a dress in a dream for single people are as follows: If an unmarried woman sees herself wearing a dress and the color of the dress is white, this indicates that she will marry a good man in the near future. If an unmarried woman is seen wearing a white dress without the presence of the groom, this indicates that she will marry a good man in the near future. The wrong emotional life that the girl is living. Some interpreters reported that the white dress in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s dreams will come true in the near future, God willing. When an unmarried woman sees the white dress in her dream and does not wear it, this carries bad news that will come to her in the near future. What is the interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream for a single woman? Seeing herself wearing a white dress in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that this dreamer will marry a good man in the near future and this man will bring her the coverage and joy she dreamed of. The dreamer wants to work to achieve a set of Egyptian themes and seeing an unmarried woman wearing a white dress in a dream shows Almighty God’s desire for this girl to have good religious beliefs and have a good and righteous life. In the Islamic religion and with God Almighty in all His deeds, worship and obedience, which brings you closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a wedding dress for an unmarried girl with an unknown groom. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream is complete, through the location of the history of hair dye in our lives, and it is one of the things that has spread in all societies. What is the interpretation of seeing hair dye in yellow, red, and white? We have put for you what is the interpretation of seeing hair dye for elderly women, married women, and pregnant women. We also provide you with details of the symbol of hair dye in a dream for a man. What is the interpretation of hair dye by Ibn Sirin? The great scholar Ibn Sirin said about dyeing hair in a dream. , is full of indicators and interpretations, and seeing the dreamer dyeing his hair during his sleep is good news for a lot of money and benefits. Also, the interpretation of the dream about dyeing hair in a dream is complete evidence of the arrival of joys and pleasures in his life and evidence that he heard the happy news and entered a new life that is better than what he lost before. Seeing dyeing white hair in a dream perfectly shows that it can be a sign of envy and sadness in the dreamer’s life, and it also shows him the serious illness that he will suffer from in his next life. Seeing him dyeing his hair black is a sign for the dreamer of a new life full of advantages, and dyeing his hair indicates On a new marriage for the dreamer in his life and a good marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing brown hair for a woman bowling? Completely dyeing the hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and its color was brown, is evidence of the girl’s success in her academic life, as well as her success in her work or in finding a new job that will make her life better. The interpretation of a dream about hair dyed yellow in a complete dream for an unmarried woman indicates this exceptional beauty that is described with her. Also, a girl who sees herself dyeing her hair red is a sign of a new love relationship and a successful connection in her life. What is the interpretation of hair dyeing for a married woman? Seeing a woman dyeing her hair black may be a sign that she feels lonely and a sign that there is a problem between her and her husband, and it may indicate that she is separating from her husband, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing her hair dyed brown in her dream, indicating that she will become pregnant in the future? Her future life. What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman dyeing her hair in her dream, which may be a sign of returning to her husband or meeting a new man and marrying him. Therefore, a divorced woman who dyes her hair in a dream is full of good visions that look good. What is the interpretation of seeing blonde hair for a pregnant woman? The interpretation of seeing blonde hair dye for a pregnant woman is good news for a healthy child, and evidence of an easy and accessible birth, and that she and her fetus are in good health and her troubles will end. And exhausting her. Since birth. Seeing a pregnant woman dyeing her hair may have brought her good news that she and her husband will suffer from a lot of glaucoma in her next life. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman’s hair dye? The interpretation of seeing hair dyed completely red in a dream is one of the visions of successful and good relationships. And the end of their problems. Also, seeing a divorced woman completely dyeing her hair in a dream indicates a change in circumstances and the emergence of many successful changes in her life. What is the interpretation of hair dyeing for a man? Seeing hair dyeing

title: Dream interpretation of live fish in a dream with different interpretations of great interpreters

preview.html: Fish in a dream have many meanings, whether they are fried, grilled, or live in the sea or outside it. The interpretation of a dream about live fish has many interpretations that vary depending on the number of fish, their size, and their condition. Definer In fact, this is how we will learn about the interpretation of this vision according to the leading scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about live fish. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the vision of live fish in a dream, and he said: If their number is known, then this is for women, and if the number is not, then it is money and spoils. And whoever sees himself Catching a big fish indicates benefit and many good things that will come to him. Seeing fish with soft skin symbolizes goodness for those who want to deceive. Seeing a brown fish is a good sign for those. Whoever wants to get married and sees a dead fish in the sea, the vision is not good and is evidence of hope that will not be fulfilled. And whoever sees fish in his bed, the vision is not good for the one who walks on the sea, or if the fortuneteller is sick, and God knows best. But if the fortuneteller catches a fish from cloudy water, then He suffers from severe anxiety. As for whoever sees that he is eating live fish, he has reached the king, but if he sees himself eating salted fish, he will be greatly affected, and if the number of fish is four, then it symbolizes women, but if the number is larger than it, then this indicates money and spoils, as Seeing fried fish symbolizes an answer to prayer, but fried fish in a dream symbolizes a journey in search of knowledge. It is said: Whoever sees that he is buying a fish from a fisherman, he will buy a maid or marry a woman. However, if the fish moves from the sweet sea to the salty sea, or the fish goes Salty to sweet sea. The sea symbolizes hypocrisy, and seeing small and large fish is a sign of interest in joys and sorrows. If one of the dreamers falls on a grilled fish from the sky, then the dream here is good news, an answer to prayer, and an indication of his victory over his enemies and his rise to the position. And if a married woman sees that she is cooking a live fish This indicates good character and good qualities, and eating live fish can be beneficial for him, and God knows best. In a dream, a sea fish is talking to it symbolizes revealing the king’s secret. Seeing fish in hot places indicates hardship and suffering, but seeing them in cold places is good news. Interpretation of a dream about live fish for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees a live fish in her dream, this means that Her birth will be easier and God will give her a female, but if the fish is cooked, this indicates the great food that will enter the house upon her arrival. A new baby, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a large live fish. Seeing a large fish in a dream symbolizes the many profits that the dreamer will achieve from the projects he is working on. Interpretation of seeing live fish in a dream. Seeing live fish in a dream generally symbolizes food and goodness that the dreamer will enjoy, Seeing it in one dream is a sign of ambition and closeness to achieving goals. However, if a divorced woman sees a live fish in her dream, this indicates her marriage to a man who loves her and knows her value.

title: Interpretation of a dream when you see yourself climbing a mountain

preview.html: Interpretation of climbing a sandy mountain in a dreamInterpretation of seeing climbing a sandy mountain in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will embark on a journey to earn a living. Also, if one sees himself climbing a sandy mountain in a dream in an easy way, this indicates his good intentions. Seeing walking on sand dunes in a dream indicates A favorable situation and a major change in circumstances for the better. Seeing an attempt to climb a mountain and climbing it, then the dreamer being able to reach it, indicates that he is thinking about an important matter. Dreaming of descending the mountain with him and falling in this dream indicates some of the problems and worries that the dreamer is suffering from. Falling From a mountain in a dream, some scholars interpreted it as a sign of the end of sorrows and the dreamer’s freedom from what restricts him. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a sandy mountain for a single woman: When a single girl sees herself trying to reach the top of a mountain, this indicates her striving to achieve her goals. Finding an unmarried woman climbing a mountain In a dream, it indicates that she is in a failed romantic relationship and ends up failing, and God knows best. To dream of an unmarried woman climbing a mountain, this indicates goodness and great wealth that she will acquire. For an unmarried woman, climbing sand mountains in a dream is one of the desired dreams that has importance. Great for achieving happiness. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman climbing a mountain in a dream and feeling comfortable climbing it, as this indicates comfort, peace and stability. For a married woman to see herself and her husband trying to climb a mountain and failing, this indicates that she is suffering from some family problems. Seeing yourself climbing a sandy mountain in a dream and reaching the top means kindness, great living, and satisfying a woman’s desires. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman climbing a mountain with difficulty in a dream shows the fatigue and fear that this woman suffers from. Climbing a sandy mountain easily in a dream means that A pregnant woman will have an easy and accessible birth and her health will improve soon. Interpretation of a dream about going up and down a mountain: Seeing yourself climbing a mountain and then falling from it in a dream means that the dreamer will go through some setbacks in the next period of his life. Seeing yourself climbing a mountain with someone you love in a dream means Also kindness, good circumstances, and the end of all problems and fears. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain with the dead. Interpretation of seeing a mountain climbing with dead people in a dream indicates the serious illness that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a mountain with dead peopleClimbing a mountain with a girl in a dream for an unmarried young man is one of the visions that It indicates the approaching engagement and marriage of his and the achievement of goodness. If you see yourself climbing a mountain with someone you hate in a dream, this indicates your victory over him and the dreamer who gets rid of all his enemies. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you in As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of receiving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin, money is one of the necessary things and things to ensure the acquisition of life’s basic and necessary or limited and recreational requirements, and since the presence of money means the existence of life for people, as one can provide him with food, drink, and shelter if he is not married, and if If he is married, it means greater demands on him and his family, because it is a matter where life is. It is complicated, and while seeing money in a dream is a somewhat strange dream for people and has many different interpretations and indicators, which are based on the condition of the fortuneteller as well as the nature of the money he saw, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of obtaining money in a dream and all the interpretations related to it. Interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes: If one sees in a dream that he is receiving money and papers, this means that this person is concerned about his future and is very afraid of the future and is doing his best to obtain as much money as possible, and many other interpretations are presented below: The vision of receiving banknotes indicates Titles in general indicate success in practical life and achieving goals and difficult things that are difficult to achieve. Also, seeing the loss of bank notes for an unmarried girl indicates the loss of suitable marriage opportunities for her that will not be repeated, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of the dream about eating honey in A dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream. According to the interpreter Al-Nabulsi, seeing paper money in a dream shows what the dreamer will receive as compensation for his efforts, patience, and endurance for many things or actions that he has done. They are as follows: It shows receiving an order that the dreamer was eagerly awaiting, such as if a single person sees bank notes, this indicates that he will get married soon, and if he sees in his dream that he will receive a bank note, this indicates that he will. She will have a male child soon. If he sees that he is losing banknotes, this indicates the loss of one of his children or his inability to pay his debts. As for Ibn Sirin, seeing the banknotes indicates the words that the viewer hears and causes him psychological distress. And moral damages. Also, if a person sees that he is bringing money in a dream and finds it missing, this indicates that he is losing a lot of money because of his way of thinking. However, if a person sees that he is paying paper sums, this indicates his great loss of money and the presence of family problems, but if the titles Colored in a dream, this indicates the man’s lack of religion or his testimony is invalid, and God Almighty. And God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams about plastic utensils in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of a dream for someone who gives money in his dream, if he sees that he is giving money in a dream and he is generous in his work, then this indicates the financial problems that he will face The dreamer. The afterlife, and many interpretations and signs, are as follows: Seeing someone giving money in a dream indicates the kindness and goodness of the person, and also shows the need for...

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place

preview.html: If a pregnant woman feels fear and extreme anxiety in a dream as she climbs to a high position, this indicates some misfortunes that this dreamer will face in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of rising to a high position in a dream for an unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was climbing to a very high position. This was the first time she saw him in a dream and she felt very afraid and anxious. Here it explains that there are some great disasters that this single woman will witness in her life. They must always ask for forgiveness and get closer to God. And if he sees a woman in a dream, then he sees a high status Very. And she was very happy and optimistic in her dream that she would climb it. It could indicate that she has reached many dreams and desires that she wants to achieve in her life. And a long period of happiness and comfort will pass, God willing. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means that she is trying to climb a very high place. For her, but she did not succeed in climbing there in the dream. It appears that there are some losses that this dreamer will suffer in her life. She will try to repeat her efforts until she reaches success, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place for another person. Interpretation of a vision of climbing to A high position in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she and her children are climbing to a very high place. Be afraid of them until they reach the place. It indicates that this dreamer will lead her children on the path of success. And try to keep away from them the many disappointing and ugly things that they direct. If A married woman saw that she was trying to climb a high position in a dream. A married woman also sees In the dream, she was trying to climb a very high position in the dream with the help of her husband in the dream. The dream shows that this married dreamer is trying to overcome all the problems she is going through in this period of her life with the help of her husband, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing climbing to a high position in a dream for a woman The divorced woman: If the divorced woman saw in her dream that she was climbing to a high place and that someone she did not know before was helping her in her life. This indicates that this divorced woman will marry a righteous man. He will try to help her reach success. What if the divorced woman saw in a dream that she wanted to climb a high position in the dream? But she could not climb alone in the dream. This shows some of the big problems that this dreamer faces in her life. He wanted to get rid of them, but he could not. And if the divorced woman saw in the dream that she was climbing to a high place and in a very short time in the dream, she would feel happy. title: I dreamed that I was eating cooked meat

preview.html: I dreamed that I ate cooked meat in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Meat is considered one of the main meals that has no difference in its love. There are many different and diverse ways to cook and serve meat, such as boiled and roasted meat and others, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was eating Cooked meatFor great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the dreamer’s condition, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I ate cooked meat in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of eating cooked meat in a dream. It shows that the next period of the dreamer’s life will be Full of happiness for the appearance of the thing he desires. Seeing in a dream eating cooked meat from soup. It indicates that there will be a mutually beneficial relationship between the dreamer and someone close to him. Cooked meat with rice in a dream. It indicates an abundance of pleasant events in the dreamer’s life. Cooking meat in a dream. It indicates The fortuneteller expects something happy in his professional life, and God knows best. See another interpretation: I dreamed that I was buying raw meat. I dreamed that I was eating cooked meat in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman eating cooked meat in a dream bodes well for her in the near future. Cooked beef in a woman’s dream Single woman. This indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing one roasted meat in a dream shows the effort she is making to achieve his goals and aspirations. Distributing cooked meat in one’s sleep indicates that someone dear to her will give her a precious gift that will make her feel very happy, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of a dream Washing in the bathroom. I dreamed that I ate cooked meat in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman eating cooked meat in a dream indicates abundant goodness and blessings for her and her family, and God knows best. Eating pork in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will go through a difficult time due to the loss of a loved one, and God knows best. Seeing a woman A married woman eats beef in a dream. It turns out that she will be pregnant in the next period, and God knows best. Cutting cooked meat in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has done many bad things in her life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of dreams about buying meat from a butcher and a butcher shop. I dreamed that I ate cooked meat in a dream about Pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman eating cooked meat in a dream indicates an easy birth without stress or pain. Distributing cooked meat to a sleeping pregnant woman, which indicates that God will provide her with the fetus she wants, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman buying cooked meat in a dream indicates that she will soon undergo childbirth procedures. I dreamed that I was eating cooked meat in a dream about a man. Seeing a man eating cooked meat in a dream mentioned his ample livelihood in the coming period. Eating rotten meat in a man’s dream indicates a bad period and a feeling of loneliness and depression. Seeing a man eating raw meat in a dream reports bad physical and psychological conditions in the coming period. Eating cooked cat meat

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete ablution in a dream?

preview.html: Hadouta website provides you with an interpretation of seeing complete ablution in a dream. We have completely collected for you everything related to the symbol of washing in a dream, and we also include in the dream the signs of incomplete washing, as well as the difficulty of washing in a complete dream. A pregnant woman dreams, like a man, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why do you dream of washing Ibn Sirin? The interpretation in the dream of washing, as the scholar Ibn Sirin said about it, is evidence of victory over enemies and protection from evil. Bathing in a dream is full of dreams that It indicates the return of the absent or the search for something lost to the dreamer. Seeing complete ablution and prayer in a dream is an excellent indicator of getting rid of worries and sorrows, as well as evidence of getting rid of sadness and comfort. Praying in a dream completely without washing is evidence that the dreamer will commit an unpleasant act in the next life. , as well as a sign of loss. See also: Why dream of saying a complete prayer in a dream? A bath in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq and the interpretation of ablution in a dream performed in the book of Imam al-Sadiq is evidence that the dreamer achieves his desires and goals that he aspires to. The wrong vision of ablution in a dream is a sign of That the dreamer is in great distress and prays to God to get out of this distress. Why dream of swimming in a dream is full, and the dreamer was in bed, which indicates the loss of a loved one and is a symbol of death. Bathing in the bathroom in the dreamer’s dream is one of the visions that show that the dreamer often commits disobedience and sins. He needs to repent and return to God. See also: Why is the dream of a prayer rug complete in a dream? Why dream of washing for a common woman? Complete washing in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions in which she was hoping to achieve her desires and goals that she had aspired to throughout her life. Washing and praying in a complete dream for a woman A virtuous woman is evidence of the nearness of marriage, finding happiness and joy, and hearing good news. Incomplete washing in a dream is a sign that unpleasant things will happen to the girl and a sign that her marriage will not be completed. See also: Why do you dream of seeing the noon prayer in a complete dream? The bathroom in a dream is complete for a divorced woman’s vision. A divorced woman taking a complete bath in a dream is one of the good dreams that warn her to ease her pain, relieve her stress, and renew everything she missed. Also, bathing and praying in a completed dream is an excellent indicator that she will return to her husband or marry someone with whom she will be happy. Interpretation of the vision of bathing for a married woman: The dream That you are bathing and praying for a married woman is an excellent indicator of abandoning all worries and entering into a period of calm and stability. Difficulty in bathing in a dream is a sign of stress and anxiety, and the emergence of many problems in the life of a married woman with her husband may indicate divorce. In addition, the bath In the dream it has been completed, and this was a successful and complete path for the woman, as it is an excellent sign of goodness, wealth and blessing in her life. See also: Why does the Maghreb dream of praying in a complete dream? Why does a pregnant woman dream of light? Why does a pregnant woman dream of

title: Interpretation of a dream about a battle for single women

preview.html: Seeing that an unmarried woman argued with her hand in a dream and someone hit her in the dream, this indicates her marriage to a good person who makes her happy and fears for her, and there are many interpretations that we will learn together. Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream about a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is arguing a lot With an unknown person in a dream, and I felt sorry for him in the dream. This indicates that this single woman will marry someone who suits her, which is a very good thing for her life. He will be happy to be with her, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a big fight has begun between them. Her enemy in life and she rejoiced in her victory over him in the dream. This indicates that this single girl is always thinking about creating problems and fighting with each other. And between this enemy that exists in her life and God knows best. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream who was looking at her mother in A dream while arguing with someone close to her in a dream. This shows the extent of affection and compassion that this woman, a mother of an only child, has in her life and with many people around her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a quarrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel in a dream for a woman. Married If a married woman dreams that she had a big quarrel with her husband in the dream. She felt a lot of sadness and tension from him in the dream. Here the meaning indicates that this married woman has all the love and respect for her husband in the wife’s life. She is trying to overcome all the problems she sees. And seeing a woman A married woman dreams in a dream that she quarreled with her brother in a dream. He tries to win them over in the dream and was happy about that. This indicates the bad psychological state that this married woman is experiencing during this period. And that she is trying to release the energy of anger inside her in front of anyone in her life. The same is true. For a married woman who dreams that she is having a big quarrel with someone she does not know and she is upset because he did that to her. The meaning here indicates the great happiness that will come to this married woman in her life. At this time she will marry her children, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dispute in a dream For the divorced woman: If the divorced woman saw in a dream that she was watching a big quarrel between her ex-husband in the dream and her family. He just looked at them without interfering. This indicates that there are some recent problems that will arise between the family of this dreaming divorced woman and her ex-husband, and God knows best. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream It creates a lot of trouble and a big fight with someone she did not know before in her life. Here the meaning indicates that this divorced dreamer will soon marry someone who is good for her, and who will make her happy in her life, God willing. If a divorced woman dreams that she sees many people arguing in front of her and she is trying to reconcile them In a dream. This indicates that this divorced woman sees some wrong things in her life. He is trying to correct them and get rid of those mistakes, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream about a man and its meaning. The same is true for the dreamer who sees in the dream.

title: Long nails in the dream of a married woman and a single girl

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, hello and welcome to the Dream Interpretation website. In this meeting, we will discuss the interpretation of long nails in a dream, and we will also look at the most important clues, whether it is a single girl, a married woman, or a man. We wish you all the best in this matter. Interpretation of long nails in a dream in general: Long nails indicate status, power and gains and are highly praised in women’s dreams, provided that these nails look clean and healthy. Some interpreters dislike the length of toenails because they often symbolize anxiety, especially if they appear dirty in a dream. Interpretation of long nails in a dream for a single woman: Long nails are one of the standards of beauty and at the same time express a girl’s confidence and self-esteem, and long nails also express The femininity of a woman. The longer the nails are in a dream does not indicate positive intentions. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that the nails have grown in beauty and length, then in waking life she can achieve what she desires. Long nails portend good developments, God willing, provided that these nails are healthy and clean. Health, cleanliness, and beauty are considered good omens in visions. If the fingernails and toenails are long and dirty, the dream may express the accumulation of worries and problems, and sometimes dirty nails indicate many sins and mistakes, And a decline in feelings. Interpretation of long nails in a dream for a married woman: It is a good interpretation for a married woman to see in her dream as if her nails were long because it may represent more material gains, and perhaps long nails show the good position of the woman in the family or social environment. It is also praiseworthy in expressing the vision that she sees. A married woman looks after her fingernails and toenails. Care represents the renewal of a woman's psychological energy. The longer, smoother and cleaner a woman's nails are, the more positive its meaning. The dream is interpreted according to the woman's ambitions and desires. For example, if a married woman seeks to improve her financial situation and sees in her dream that her nails have developed, then her goal in waking life may be achieved, but if she sees them broken or broken, the dream may express her disappointment, disillusionment or despair and is not a good interpretation. For a married woman to see as if someone was cutting her nails, because the vision then can express weakness or weakness. Long nails in a man’s dreamAlthough they are disliked in waking life, long nails in a man’s dream are among the positive symbols, because they are a sign of victory. And profit on the material and moral levels. Among the things that are praised in interpretation is the use of a file and nail scissors, as these tools may express the means by which the fortuneteller can achieve some of his goals, and perhaps some of the means by which the fortuneteller can achieve some of his goals, and perhaps some of the means of Qiyafa in interpretation express virtues, piety, and purification, such as a comb, scissors, and a razor blade. Long nails are unpleasant in a dream, so if If it is dirty, it is a sign
